entries.name: new(path)
entries.desc: Open a group database at path

entries.name: add(group, members)
entries.desc: Add an Array of members to group

entries.name: flush(output=nil)
entries.desc: Flush the group database.  If output is given the database will be written there instead of to the original path.

entries.name: members(group)
entries.desc: Retrieve the list of members from group
